Title: Scientific and research work of New China
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Part of an 11-poster series, "Scientific and research work of New China" (新中国的科学研究工作), published in 1952.The poster shows archeological research into Peking Man in Zhoukoudian (周口店), an area located on the east of Fangshan District, Beijing.
